sourcesContent:
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import css from './RecipeListItem.module.css'; export const RecipeListItem = ({ name, time, servings, calories, image, difficulty, isEasy, }) => { return (

  • {name}

    Icon

    {time} minutes

    Icon

    {servings} servings

    Icon

    {calories} calories

    Difficulty

    Easy Medium Hard
    • ); }; RecipeListItem.propTypes = { name: PropTypes.string.isRequired, time: PropTypes.number.isRequired, servings: PropTypes.number.isRequired, calories: PropTypes.number.isRequired, image: PropTypes.string.isRequired, difficulty: PropTypes.oneOf(['easy', 'medium', 'hard']).isRequired, };
